english.segment1: Many choose to find their hope in the thoughts of afterlife, When there is none to be found right here before we die. So I understand the feeling of helplessness, When we are just taught to wait here.. wait here for death.
english.segment2: Wait here for death. Wait for this suffering to end. Wait here for death. Wait here for death. Wait for this suffering to end.
english.segment3: We are not forgotten, for a kingdom is offered beyond that of golden streets. We can represent now what will one day be complete.
english.segment4: Simplicity is not a curse where strength is humbled. And the powerless rise (and the powerless rise). This is a kingdom born upside-down. This is a kingdom where the broken are crowned.
english.segment5: Wait here for death. Wait here for death. The "blessings" of excess are only a burden on us.
english.segment6: It is a broken system where we just wait for death. It is a broken system where suffering can never end.
english.segment7: Simplicity is not a curse where strength is humbled. And the powerless rise (and the powerless rise). This is a kingdom born upside-down. This is a kingdom where the broken are crowned.. (the broken are crowned).
english.segment8: If helplessness is our system then were better off upside-down.
